Title: Long Sleeveless Form Fitting Evening Gown

Featured-image: CJ202-red-long-sleeveless-form-fitting-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A trumpet silhouette with a form fitting look is accented by the detailed neckline. The shoulder and trim are beaded with sequined for a sparkling look that extends to the back of the gown where a stunning design is appliqued at the lower back. An illusion back with sheer fabric completes the look.
